trans-unit.source: Provides a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref> implementation that reads object graphs and generates a XAML node stream.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlReader"></xref>读取对象图，并生成 XAML 节点流的实现。

trans-unit.source: Use the XamlObjectReader in scenarios where you want to process an object graph, which is typically the object graph of an application that is originally generated from a XAML source.
trans-unit.target: 使用 XamlObjectReader 方案中你想要处理对象图，这通常是最初从 XAML 源生成的应用程序的对象图。

trans-unit.source: You might use the XamlObjectReaderwhere a round trip is made from a XAML start point to a XAML end point.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用从 XAML 起始点到 XAML 终结点进行往返行程 XamlObjectReaderwhere。

trans-unit.source: Or you might run a XamlObjectReader over the object graph; process the intermediate XAML node stream, if it is required, by using APIs on <xref:System.Xaml.XamlType> and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>; and then use <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter> to serialize XAML nodes to XML.
trans-unit.target: 或者，你可能在对象关系图; 运行 XamlObjectReader处理中间的 XAML 节点流中，如果它必需的在使用 Api 的<xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>和<xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember>; 然后使用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>要序列化到 XML 的 XAML 节点。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlMember> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlType>

trans-unit.source: More advanced scenarios might supply a <xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter> override and a specific XAML schema context that the XamlObjectReader uses and then passes to the writer override.
trans-unit.target: 提供更高级的方案可能<xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>override 和非特定的 XAML 架构上下文 XamlObjectReader 使用，然后传递到编写器，重写。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlXmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: Typical scenarios for using XamlObjectReader call the members that XamlObjectReader implements; they also call <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Close%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>, and <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A> from the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader> base class.
trans-unit.target: 典型应用场景使用 XamlObjectReader 调用 XamlObjectReader 实现; 的成员它们还调用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Close%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>，和<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A>从<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader>基的类。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: If initialized with this constructor, the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> object has the initial settings of a default <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>object and the initial context of a default <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>对象具有一个默认的<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>对象和默认<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>初始上下文</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>的初始设置</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>的构造函数初始化

trans-unit.source: The root of the object tree / object graph to read.
trans-unit.target: 对象树的根 / 对象图中以读取。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref> class with the specified reader settings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref>使用指定的读取器设置的类。

trans-unit.source: The settings object specifies rules for reader operations, such as line number processing, error handling behavior, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 设置对象指定的读取器运算，如行编号处理、 错误处理行为和等等的规则。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: If initialized with this constructor, the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> object has the initial context of a default <xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>对象具有默认<xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlSchemaContext>初始上下文</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>的构造函数初始化

trans-unit.source: The root of the object tree to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的对象树的根。

trans-unit.source: A settings object.
trans-unit.target: 一个设置对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref> class with the specified schema context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref>与指定的架构上下文的类。

trans-unit.source: If initialized with this constructor, the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> object has the initial settings of a default <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用此构造函数初始化<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>对象具有默认的初始设置<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>对象。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>

trans-unit.source: The root of the object tree to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的对象树的根。

trans-unit.source: The schema context for the reader to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的读取器架构上下文。

trans-unit.source: schemaContext is .
trans-unit.target: schemaContextis .

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref> class with the specified schema context and reader settings.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader"></xref>用指定的架构上下文和读取器设置的类。

trans-unit.source: The settings object specifies rules for reader operations, such as line number processing and error handling behavior.
trans-unit.target: 设置对象指定读取器操作，如行编号处理和错误处理行为的规则。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReaderSettings>

trans-unit.source: The root of the object tree to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的对象树的根。

trans-unit.source: The schema context for the reader to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的读取器架构上下文。

trans-unit.source: A settings object.
trans-unit.target: 一个设置对象。

trans-unit.source: schemaContext is .
trans-unit.target: schemaContextis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the object instance that is available at the current reader position.
trans-unit.target: 获取读取器当前位置的对象实例。

trans-unit.source: The object instance at the current reader position; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the reader position is not on an object.
trans-unit.target: 对象实例中的当前的读取器位置;或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果读取器位置不在对象上。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that reports whether the reader position is at the end of the file.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，报告读取器位置是否在文件末尾。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the reader position is at the end of the file; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果读取器位置是在该文件; 末尾否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"></xref> at the reader position, if the reader position is on a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlMember"></xref>中的读取器位置，如果读取器位置位于<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The current member; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the reader position is not on a member.
trans-unit.target: 当前的成员;或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果读取器位置不在成员上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the XAML namespace declaration from the current reader position.
trans-unit.target: 从当前读取器位置获取 XAML 命名空间声明。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a non-null result only if the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A> property of the current reader position is <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回非 null 结果仅当<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>属性的当前读取器位置是<xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: It does not infer a namespace that is based on the context of other node types, such as an object in that namespace.
trans-unit.target: 它无法推断基于其他节点类型，例如该命名空间中的对象的上下文的命名空间。

trans-unit.source: The XAML namespace declaration if the reader is positioned on a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果读取器定位在的 XAML 命名空间声明<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader> APIs, you typically check the NodeType property after every operation that potentially advances the reader position, such as the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Read%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 使用时<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>Api，你通常 NodeType 属性后检查可能的位置向前移动读取器，如每个操作<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Read%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Read%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader>

trans-unit.source: NodeType indicates the information that you can obtain from the current reader position and the methods that you call next.
trans-unit.target: NodeType 指示可以获取从当前读取器位置和下一步调用的方法的信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, you might access the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A> properties; or you might call the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A> method if you are not interested in the contents of the current node type.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能会访问<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A>，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A>属性; 也可能调用<xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A>方法如果你不感兴趣的当前节点类型的内容。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlReader.Skip%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A>

trans-unit.source: The type of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 当前节点的类型。

trans-unit.source: Provides the next XAML node from the source object graph, if a node is available.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个节点可用，请提供源对象图中的下一步 XAML 节点。

trans-unit.source: After you call the Read method and obtain a `true` result, you typically access the node properties.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 Read 方法并获取后`true`结果，则通常访问的节点属性。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A> property, you can access the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A>, or <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>属性，你可以访问<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A>， <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A>，或<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A>属性。</xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Instance%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Value%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Type%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.Member%2A> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a node is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果某个节点可用;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that provides schema information for the information set.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个对象，提供的信息集的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: The schema context is a conceptual intermediary between a schema in the conventional sense, and the handling of XAML schema concepts by particular XAML processors (parsing, reading, and writing operations).
trans-unit.target: 架构上下文是在传统意义上，架构和处理的 XAML 架构概念的特定 XAML 处理器 （分析、 读取和写入操作） 之间的概念中介。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides schema information for the information set.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供的信息集的架构信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> of the object at the current reader position.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref>的读取器的当前位置处的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a non-null result only if the <xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A> property of the current reader position is <xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回非 null 结果仅当<xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>属性的当前读取器位置是<xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType>.</xref:System.Xaml.XamlNodeType> </xref:System.Xaml.XamlObjectReader.NodeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"></xref> of the object at the current reader position; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the position is not on an object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlType"> </xref>当前读取器位置; 处的对象或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果位置不在对象上。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the node at the current reader position.
trans-unit.target: 获取位于当前读取器位置的节点的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current node; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the reader position is not on a <xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref> node type.
trans-unit.target: 当前节点; 的值或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，如果读取器位置不在<xref href="System.Xaml.XamlNodeType"></xref>节点类型。
